# radiusFormat

**Instance Property**

Declares the format of the radii in the radius buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
var radiusFormat: MTLAttributeFormat { get set }
```

## Discussion

Defaults to  `MTLAttributeFormatFloat`.
title: radiusFormat
